mapper.select: SELECT box_order_no, products_name, box_order_date, box_order_status, box_final_price, total_count FROM ( SELECT op.box_order_no, op.products_no, products_name, box_order_date, box_order_status, box_final_price, member_no , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY op.box_order_no ORDER by op.box_order_no) prn , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY member_no ORDER BY o.box_order_no DESC ) rn , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM box_order WHERE member_no = #{member_no}) total_count FROM box_order_products op JOIN products pr ON op.products_no = pr.products_no JOIN box_order o ON op.box_order_no = o.box_order_no JOIN box_pay p ON op.box_order_no = p.box_order_no WHERE member_no = #{member_no} ) t WHERE prn = 1 AND rn <= 2 AND box_order_date - ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3) > 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM box_order WHERE member_no = #{member_no} AND box_order_status = #{status}
AND box_order_date - ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3) > 0
